tool_description: Extracts and standardizes building characteristics, construction details, and property information for fire risk assessment.

building_address.description: Complete street address of the building

assessment_date.description: Date of assessment in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid address format: Provide a complete street address including number, street name, city, and state.
Assessment date error: Use ISO 8601 date-time format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
Property not found: The specified address or property ID cannot be located in available databases.
usage: Provide building_address and assessment_date to extract basic building information. Optionally include property_id for more precise identification.

building_type.description: Classification of building use (residential, commercial, industrial, etc.)

square_footage.description: Total building area in square feet
